values.description:
At Parker Bathrooms we provide a personalised service designing and supplying bespoke bathrooms throughout Sussex, Surrey and London.  We are a family run business that offers an extensive selection of the world’s leading brands. Located in the elegant Seven Dials area of Brighton and Hove we have been supplying tailor-made bathrooms for over 25 years.

As expert bathroom designers we collaborate with you to create the bathroom of your dreams, paying attention to even the smallest of details. Every client and every bathroom is important to us and we guarantee our bespoke service will give you the best design experience that you could wish for. 

We invite you to browse our showroom or call us for more details - whether it’s a stylish bathroom update or a complete remodel, we pride ourselves in offering an excellent service providing quality products at a competitive cost.

Welcome to Parker Bathrooms.
values.name: Parker Bathrooms
skribita

values: Magazine articles, books and events for writers

values.description:
skribita is … all about discovering hidden talents and new skills … or finessing old ones.
 
skribita is … an on-going series of Brighton-based workshops, weekends and events where writers share their craft, offer advice and reveal tricks of the trade. 

skribita is … not like having to do your homework! Our courses are accessible, illuminating, inspiring, collaborative, confidence-building … and fun!
 
skribita is … an on-going resource for writers, both new and experienced. As a friend of skribita, you can join the writers’ bloc on-line forum and find like-minded creative people, ready to share techniques, celebrate successes and help you to cut through those paralysing ‘is-it-just-me?’ confidence dips. Because we’re all on the same page.
 
skribita is … the brainchild of Sue Teddern and Edward Crask. They know that writing doesn’t always have to be a solitary slog. Come and join the party!

values.name: Epicuro
values.description:
Epicuro operates at the leading edge in the realisation of green building products that are both superior in performance and environmentally safer than others. Our products all come with high value, expert advice that ensures our customers and their clients realise the best possible outcomes from them.

Epicuro manufacture products for:

- Cleaning stone, render and concrete structures and pavements
- Protection of rail and highway concrete structures
- Protection of stone and concrete buildings and pavements
- Graffiti removal and protection
- Coating removal
- Cement & concrete removal
- Anti-carbonation
- Floor screeds & coatings
- Waterproofing
- Grout injection
- Water seepage
- Damp elimination and prevention

Recent projects where Epicuro products have been used include:

- London Bridge Station refurbishment
- Brighton Goods Bridge No.6, Battersea, London
- Borough Viaduct, London
- Tyne-tunnel 2, Newcastle-Upon-Tyne
- New Elvet Bridge, Durham
- Museum of Liverpool
- Olympic Village, Stratford, London
- Dunderave Castle, Argyll, Scotland

values.description:
Kor Chiro Studio is your source in Brighton, MI for vitalistic chiropractic care. We don't focus on what's wrong with you but rather what's right with you! We understand that people come in with issues but they leave with a renewed understanding of how amazing their body is and how it truly works! Our goal is to increase the life within you and allow your body to express healing and true health through chiropractic care. 

For more information about transforming your life visit our website (korchirostudio.com) or call us at (810) 360-0338. We'd love to hear from you!
values.name: kor chiro studio
Deans Place Hotel
values.description:
Originally a vast farming estate, Deans Place became a private Hotel at the beginning of the 20th century.  Since then the estate has evolved into a highly regarded Alfriston Hotel and Restaurant, combining heritage charm with impeccable service and tranquility.

Set on the banks of the Cuckmere River at the foot of the South Downs National Park, our  idyllic position offers exhilarating contrasts for short break in Sussex.  Enjoy the bustle of Alfriston Village, or relax with afternoon tea in our Victorian gardens. Perhaps take supper before a crackling log fire, dine alfresco on our terrace or enjoy our fine dining menu in Harcourts Restaurant.

We also pride ourselves on exquisite weddings, well organised conferences and a diary full of events.

At Deans Place Country Hotel, Sussex, all of the leading towns of the South Coast are within easy reach.  Visit the cosmopolitan city of Brighton, the County Town of Lewes, or enjoy the promenade and famous carpet gardens of Eastbourne.

values.name: studio_campbell
values.description:
studio_campbell is architecture+ 

The studio provides architectural and design consultancy services: defining the client need, identifying the optimum response and enabling the solution. 

Our ethos is to provide client centred design solutions at any stage of a project. Our experience comprises of a range of project types: Work; Learning; Home; Recreation; Neighbourhoods. of all scales from interior fit-outs to area masterplans. Our expertise covers Project Inception; Innovation; Facilitation through to Operation.

Studio_campbell are based in Brighton, UK but have wide ranging international experience including working on projects in Asia, America, and Africa

Based in Brighton and serving clients all around the world, Oliver Relations offers a comprehensive public relations consultancy service. We work in close partnership with our clients to identify their business needs and deliver bespoke PR and publicity campaigns. Our services include media relations, marketing & promotional consultancy and crisis management.

Our creative boutique PR agency offers a carefully balanced combination of experience, enthusiasm and flair, designed to broaden horizons and stimulate more business.
values.name: Oliver Relations

values.description:
We own and operate eight of the UK’s most prestigious marinas and pride ourselves on our reputation for offering exceptional facilities and customer service. 

Our locations include Brighton Marina, Chichester Marina, Falmouth Marina, Gosport Marina, Port Solent Marina, Southsea Marina, Sovereign Harbour Marina and Swanwick Marina.

Our core business is the wet and dry berthing of leisure craft and our marinas provide a total of over 5,000 marina pontoon berths. We also provide storage ashore for up to 2,000 boats and operate boat lifting and boat moving services at all of our marinas. 

We offer over 290,000 sq m of property for rent across our marina sites. Our tenants are critical to the services provided at each marina and are important partners for us. They provide complementary services such as food and beverage, marine chandlery, boat maintenance and repair, boat sales and brokerage and sail making.
values.name: Premier Marinas

values.description:
Founded in 2004 to meet the needs of underserved residents of Chicago’s Pilsen and Little Village neighborhoods. Esperanza has experienced dramatic growth while staying true to our community roots. Our primary service area now includes: Little Village (South Lawndale), Pilsen (Lower West Side), Brighton Park, Archer Heights, Gage Park and the suburb of Cicero.

At Esperanza, we are dedicated to providing high-quality medical care to all residents of our service area, regardless of their immigration status, race or ethnicity, income level or insurance status. All of our full-time providers and all of our clinical staff are bilingual and bi-cultural.  

We provide:

Family Medicine
Internal Medicine
Pediatrics
Social Work
Women’s Health/Obstetrics
Pediatric Allergy and Immunology
Prevention and Educational Workshops 
Linkages to Community Resources

Visit us online - esperanzachicago.org. 

Find us on Facebook -  facebook.com/esperanzahealthcenters
values.name: Esperanza Health Centers

DIGITAL Newcastle & Brighton, FAC251 & SOUTH Club in Manchester, TUP TUP PALACE in Newcastle, FIBBERS York, THE MAGNET Liverpool & TOKYO Mansion Party venues in Newcastle, York, Hull, Lincoln, Bradford, Huddersfield, Oldham    

www.TOKYOindustries.com

NSFW is a Graphic, Web and Print Design Company based in Medway, Brighton and London. 

In 2010 we started out as a small team of four creative, passionate and dedicated designers with our ears to the ground. In just three years, we have doubled in size, branched from Medway to the Sea and to the City, and built an extensive and somewhat prestigious client list, including Lydia Lunch and Small Town America Records! 

Uniquely to NSFW, We offer BOTH high functionality as well as beautiful form. Our small team consists of an expert web designer, equipped to build complex, database driven code in the most up to date languages, styles and techniques.  As well as a highly reputable graphic designer who specializes in illustration, which allows us to offer unique and bespoke to your website to give you an extra edge over competitors and to help your website to stand out from the crowd.  

Our past projects include websites for: Cherry Red Records, Lydia Lunch, Wishbone Ash, Nettwerk Records, Great Lake Swimmers, Tower Records (Ireland), Small Town America Records, ZXY Records (Germany), Talking Elephant Records, TEA Social, Black Palace Records and Hanns Salons. Sun And Air Solar Panels, Tilerite ltd, Bespoke Wedding Planning UK
values.name: NSFWDesign
Vibrabody
values.description:
Vibrabody Personal Training studios specialise in a revolutionary new form of exercise known as Whole Body Vibration (WBV) Training.

Individually designed exercise programs are performed on state of the art VibroGym machines and supervised by a personal trainer.  Research has proven that a 20 minute workout on the VibroGym provides benefits equivalent to an hour of standard gym training.

Whole Body Vibration training provides wide reaching benefits ranging from improved fitness and weight loss, reduced stress, improved circulation and balance, increased strength, flexibility and improved bone density.This type of training is very safe, and well suited to almost all people regardless of their age or fitness level.

* ONE WEEK FREE TRIAL* at our Albert Park or Brighton studios.

Kennedy Plumbing and Heating
values.description:
Greg Kennedy and his Plumbing and Heating Company has been offering personal plumbing service in Denver since the 1980s. Greg Kennedy and his team specialize in air conditioning installation, central air conditioning repair and maintenance, plugged drain service, new construction plumbing, residential plumbing, residential air conditioning service, repair and installation, and water heater replacement. Since we offer 24/7 service call us if you have a plumbing emergency. Greg Kennedy enjoys working directly with his clients and building a long term relationship that is based on quality service and a 100% satisfaction guarantee.

Kennedy Plumbing and Heating provides plumbing, air conditioning and heating services in the following Metro Denver areas: Arvada, Aurora, Bennett, Boulder, Brighton, Broomfield, Castle Pines, Commerce City, Denver, Englewood, Greenwood Village, Lakewood, Littleton. Lone Tree, Northglenn, Strasburg, Westminster and Wheat Ridge.

We offer affordable, professional website design to all sizes of business. Our prices are competitive, our services are excellent, and customer service is key. No jargon, we speak plain English.

Website prices are from as low as £290 for a static site, or from £400 for a site with content management systems (CMS) to allow you to edit content yourself.

Based in Worthing, West Sussex and Brighton, East Sussex. We often work for businesses in London, and also nationwide. Founded in 2010 by Andrew Rowland, Total Website Design originally started by creating small websites for local businesses.
values.name: Total Website Design
